game.name: Treasure Island
game.description:
The lovely mahjong-inspired theme arcade challenge has just entered the virtual world! Do not you try it out, complete all puzzles and show off the world that you are the biggest fan of mahjong challenges? You would have multiple mahjong tiles to match and set your own huge score. Hurry up man since the time is on! Try to complete this matching task as fast as you can to complete each level with the maximum score possible! There are multiple levels to play through to kill your time.

You can also become a master of Treasure Island if you practice it several times in your device during your free hours. Remember treasure will only be yours if you complete all the puzzles in the least time possible. Just click the tiles of the same picture to remove them from the screen! Keep clicking the tiles until all the tiles shown on the screen will be removed in this HTML5 matching game! Be careful since you have to complete each level in the given time frame!

Track your coins by having a look at the top left corner of the screen while the middle area of the screen will show you how much time is left to clear your puzzle! When the time is up, the screen will show how many pirates you have found so far. Complete all the puzzles to become the best puzzle solver of the city! In case of being bored, you can try out our other popular titles from the category of free arcade puzzle games to have fun without download.

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Treasure Island at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
